The avatar features a sleek and metallic gorilla body, with a muscular build that exudes strength and resilience. Its fur appears to be made of shimmering lines of code, creating an otherworldly effect as if it is a creature born from the digital realm itself. The color palette is a striking combination of metallic silvers, deep blacks, and vibrant electric blues and greens, adding to the avatar's futuristic and high-tech aesthetic.
